ar: إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا كِتَبًا أُنزِلَ مِن بَعْدِ مُوسَى
en: indeed we have heard a [recited] Book revealed after Moses

ar: يَهْدِى إِلَى الْحَقِّ وَإِلَى طَرِيقٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
en: which guides to the truth and to a straight path.
O our people, respond to the Caller [i.e., Messenger] of Allah
O our people, respond to the Caller [i.e., Messenger] of Allah
He [i.e., Allah] will forgive for you your sins
and protect you from a painful punishment.
